column1: Local Foods////After looking over the simple menu with eight sandwich options plus an assortment of salads
column2: I decided to go with the most popular item
column4: served on a pretzel bun and my choice of 2 sides - tuscan kale and house-made chips - had me sold! For 11 bucks
column5: this was my money's worth plus much more. My only gripe was the chips were a bit too salty for my taste and apparently the bottom of the basket as they were mostly crumbs but delicious nevertheless. Also
column6: if you're a fan of lemonade
column12: a refreshing drink on a hot
